# S04E15 Mort

0,144 c # single field, still image
0,144 +
0,144 Q 6
145,249 cppcc
145,173 + # crossfade
145,160 Q 6 # keep Q 6 where the previous scene is more visible
250,339 # still image
340,547 ccppc
548,575 ppccu # crossfade, pcccp + ppccc
576,951 ccppc
952,980 cluph # crossfade, cppcc + cccpp
952,980 -+--+
981,1069 pcccp

#t0 t1 t2 t3 t4
#b1 b2 b2 b3 b4
#t1 t1 t2 t3 t4
#b1 b1 b2 b3 b4
# u  p  c  c  c

1070,1097 upccc # crossfade, ppccc + cdccc (d dup)
1070,1097 -----

1098,1212 c # single field, 4th is a dup
1098,1212 +
1098,1212 Q 6

1213,1242 hccch # crossfade, cccdc (d dup) + pcccp, drop 4th, not in sync
1213,1242 + # +---+ # deinterlace all because it's single field
1213,1242 Q 6

1243,1396 pcccp
